<!-- Plugin related APIs -->



## kong.plugin.get_id()

Returns the instance ID of the plugin.

**Phases**

* rewrite, access, header_filter, response, body_filter, log

**Returns**

* `string`:  The ID of the running plugin


**Usage**

``` lua
kong.request.get_id() -- "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"
```
